author: alita85
content:
my bad! I'm mainly collating sources right now, but I'll do my best: 

TLDR
this paper discusses an optimized algorithm that does fast BLS12-381 mapping in a simpler way for approximately the same work. So in short, decrease code complexity and maintain performance.

I'm curious if anyone has heard of this before, and if it's a good method to look deeper into

author: shamatar
content: 2666 is updated with new data, and error handling proposal is removed. Since Berlin is delayed more and more, implementation is trivial and benchmarks are here it can be included with very little pain https://github.com/ethereum/EIPs/pull/2666 Depends on 2046 that also was benchmarked already
